changelog: v1.5.13: Wes Mode — hearing frequency calibration, identity check, Kris's message.
changes: NEW: Wes Mode — hearing frequency calibration (2000–8000 Hz in 500 Hz steps)
NEW: Identity check — Eve asks 'Are you Wes Johnson?' on first launch if username doesn't match
NEW: Kris's message — Eve delivers a personal message from Kris when Wes confirms identity
NEW: /api/eve/identity — returns is_wes flag based on OS username
NEW: SAPI5 pitch control in pyttsx3 — Eve's voice tuned to Wes's preferred Hz
NEW: profiles/accessibility.json — stores preferred_hz, calibrated state, calibrated_at
